title: क्या कन्नूर एअरपोर्ट पर मोबाइल चार्ज करने की वजह से इस आदमी के कपड़ों में आग लग गई ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Few Glimpses from Kannur International Airport Inauguration which happened on December 9. The inauguration was done by the @CMOKerala Shri. @vijayanpinarayi . Accompanied by the CM were other eminent guests. #kannurairport pic.twitter.com/9hjKQdnSZe
